Question: The films were among the most commercially successful pictures of the decade and catapulted this person to international stardom.
Hints: This person was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor for Saturday Night Fever and Pulp Fiction.
This person and Preston have regularly attended marriage counseling; This person has stated that therapy has helped the marriage.
This person continued to the two sequels Look Who's Talking Too (1990) and Look Who's Talking Now (1993).
